What is (are) Chronic atypical neutrophilic dermatosis with lipodystrophy and elevated temperature ?,"Chronic atypical neutrophilic dermatosis with lipodystrophy and elevated temperature, also known as CANDLE syndrome, is a rare autoinflammatory condition.
